duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle customer inquiries and provide exceptional customer service in a remote call center environment.
Efficiently navigate computer systems, guide phone conversations, and take notes during calls to support customer needs.
Effectively communicate with customers and team members using proper English and grammar.
Manage time effectively to handle multiple tasks and maintain a professional demeanor in one-on-one and team environments.
Utilize computer navigation skills to navigate dual screen, multi-tab, and multiple platform programs while engaging prospects on calls.
Adhere to company policies and represent the dealership in a positive and professional manner during customer interactions.
